dct_description_sm: Regional map of the Persian Empire, extending from the Caspian and Red Seas to the Indus River.
Shows waterways, various settlements, regional names.
Text on verso: "Le Royaume des Perses, ou l'Empire des Sophis" ; pp. 661, 664.
From: Mercator, Gerhard: Atlas sive Cosmographicae Meditationes de Fabrica Mundi Et Fabricati Figura. Sign.: Eeeeeeee.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
